title: LyingWonders.com:  Satan is behind it
post: Fringe lunacy giving religion a bad reputation.  No wonder so few get to hear the true message with this sort of thing going on.  Yup! And did you know Satan planted dinosaur fossils to lead people away from Genesis?  Some of it comes from Luther’s interpretation of Paul.  But when Paul was talking about works being dead, he was referring to the old Jewish Law prescriptions.  James has a different spin on works.  But Luther didn’t like James either!
author: daveb of wellington nz

title: LyingWonders.com:  Satan is behind it
post: Sounds so inane, attempting to “prove” everything from the bible (or so it sounds), for it can “only be explained as a deception of Satan, just as the word declares.”  I agree with daveb.  I am unsure it would be worth the time it would take to read it.
author: Andy Weiss

title: LyingWonders.com:  Satan is behind it
post: Now that one of greatest mysteries on the planet has been debunked (in a mere 25 pages with lots of spacing between lines), I suppose I can move on now to something that can have real impact on people’s lives:  starting fan clubs for Lindsay Lohan and Charlie Sheen.
author: Joe Marino
